item.title: 炒掉库克不足以满足特朗普的要求
item.description:
如果抵押贷款利率下降得不够，债券市场的干预可能会随之而来。【原文：

If mortgage rates don’t fall enough, intervention in bond markets could follow. 

】

item.title: 日本金融服务管理局推动 18 岁以下投资者获得 NISA 访问权
item.description: 日本金融厅建议扩大政府免税股票投资计划的投资者范围，允许 18 岁以下的年轻人建立长期资产组合。【原文：Japan’s Financial Services Agency has proposed broadening investor access to the government’s tax-free stock investment program to allow people younger than 18 to build long-term asset portfolios.】

item.title: 盈利不佳引发澳大利亚股市大幅下挫
item.description: 在澳大利亚八月最繁忙的报告季，投资者正在猛烈抨击那些业绩未达预期的澳大利亚公司股票。【原文：Investors are hammering shares of Australian companies that miss expectations during the busiest stretch of the country’s August reporting season.】

item.title: 世界第三大矿产商紫金警告争夺关键矿产
item.description: 中国紫金矿业集团股份有限公司（Zijin Mining Group Co.【原文：China’s Zijin Mining Group Co., the world’s third-biggest metals miner by market value, warned that growing geopolitical competition presents a challenge as nations vie to secure supplies of strategic commodities.】

item.title: 超长期日本债券吸引韩国投资与证券公司（Korea Investment & Securities Co.
item.description: 韩国投资证券公司（Korea Investment & Securities Co.【原文：Korea Investment & Securities Co. plans to buy unhedged super-long Japanese government bonds for the first time to take advantage of rich yields and its expectation for the yen to maintain gains against the dollar.】

item.title: 法国政治危机令企业主导经济复苏的希望破灭
item.description: 由于企业暂缓招聘和投资，法国最近的政治动荡将危及刚刚开始的经济复苏。【原文：France’s latest bout of political instability is set to endanger a nascent economic recovery as companies hold off on hiring and investment.】

item.title: 中国工业利润降幅放缓，铝、铜保持稳定
item.description: 由于中国工业企业 7 月份利润降幅放缓，铝和铜表现稳定，这可能会支持金属的前景。【原文：Aluminum and copper were steady as China’s industrial companies saw their profits fall at a slower pace in July, which could support the outlook for metals.】

item.title: Kpler 数据显示中国液化天然气进口量将连续第十个月下降
item.description: 克普勒公司（Kpler）的数据显示，由于管道供应强劲和国内产量增加，中国液化天然气进口量将连续第十个月同比下降。【原文：China’s imports of liquefied natural gas are poised to decline for a 10th straight month on a year-on-year basis, according to data from Kpler, due to robust piped supply and higher domestic output.】

item.title: 特朗普对钢笔的赞誉促使韩国文具股大涨 60
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的一句赞美让韩国一家制笔企业的股价创下了 19 个月以来的最高水平。【原文：A compliment from President Donald Trump sent shares of a South Korean pen maker to their highest level in 19 months.】

item.title: 卡基基风暴造成越南七人死亡，河内和各省洪水泛滥
item.description: 台风 "卡基 "在越南造成至少七人死亡，暴雨摧毁了数千栋房屋，首都大部分地区被水淹没。【原文：Typhoon Kajiki left at least seven people dead in Vietnam after bringing heavy rains that damaged thousands of homes and left much of the capital under water.】

item.title: 美元疲软、股市上涨，人民币创 11 月以来新高
item.description: 受美元走软和本地股市反弹的提振，人民币兑美元汇率升至 11 月以来的最强水平。【原文：The Chinese yuan advanced to its strongest level against the dollar since November, buoyed by a weaker greenback and a rally in local equities.】

item.title: 中国大豆压榨商可能面临没有美国大豆的冬天
item.description: 就在美国大豆出口季节开始的前几天，世界头号进口国似乎还没有为来年购买任何一批美国大豆。【原文：Just days before the start of the US export season for soybeans, the world’s top importer doesn’t appear to have bought a single American cargo for the coming year.】

item.title: 李明博与特朗普会晤后，韩国酝酿出售美元债券
item.description: 韩国总统李在明与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的首次面对面会谈帮助缓解了紧张局势，韩国正在考虑出售美元债券，熟悉此事的人士称，这将是对全球投资者情绪的一次考验。【原文：South Korea is considering a sale of dollar bonds, people familiar with the matter said, in what would be be a test of global investor sentiment after President Lee Jae Myung’s first in-person meeting with President Donald Trump helped defuse tensions.】

item.title: 海洋城为第三支私人信贷基金融资 6.12 亿美元
item.description: 新加坡国有投资者淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte.【原文：SeaTown Holdings International, a unit of Singapore’s state-owned investor Temasek Holdings Pte., has raised over $612 million in initial investor commitments for its third private credit fund, targeting deal opportunities across Asia.】

item.title: 马来西亚 PNB 计划为摩天大楼项目发行 14 亿美元债券
item.description: PNB Merdeka Ventures Sdn.正在制定一项计划，出售多达60亿林吉特（14亿美元）的伊斯兰债券，为正在进行的Merdeka 118区开发提供部分资金。【原文：PNB Merdeka Ventures Sdn. is setting up a program to sell as much as 6 billion ringgit ($1.4 billion) of Islamic bonds to partly fund the ongoing development of the Merdeka 118 precinct.】

item.title: Akeso的肺癌药物在中国研究中达到关键目标
item.description: Akeso Inc.公司表示，其备受关注的肺癌药物首次明确证明可以帮助一些患者延长寿命，这可能会提高该药物在美国获批的前景。【原文：Akeso Inc. said its closely-watched lung cancer drug has definitively demonstrated for the first time that it could help some patients live longer, potentially boosting its prospects for approval in the US.】

item.title: 澳大利亚月度通胀加速超过预期
item.description: 衡量澳大利亚月度通胀率的一项指标在 7 月份的增长速度快于预期，更加接近储备银行 2-3% 的目标上限，支持逐步降息的做法。【原文：A gauge of Australia’s monthly inflation accelerated faster than expected in July, moving closer to the top of the Reserve Bank’s 2-3% target and supporting a gradual approach to cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 严打价格战，中国工业利润降幅趋缓
item.description: 7 月份，中国工业企业利润降幅放缓，这可能表明，抑制产能过剩的努力已开始缓解生产商之间激烈竞争造成的压力。【原文：China’s industrial companies saw their profits fall at a slower pace in July, in a potential sign that efforts to curb overcapacity are starting to ease the strain from aggressive competition among producers.】

item.title: 美团期权下注达到顶峰，交易员等待价格战最新进展
item.description: 随着投资者在周三晚些时候美团发布财报前布局，对美团的期权押注已飙升至前所未有的水平。【原文：Option bets on Meituan have surged to levels never seen before as investors position ahead of its earnings report later Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国经纪商百仕达在牛市中提高融资保证金
item.description: 百仕达证券公司（Sinolink Securities Co., Ltd.）将新客户融资保证金比例提高至 100%，这标志着在中国股市关注度激增的背景下，首家公开采取收紧措施的券商。【原文：Sinolink Securities Co. raised its margin deposit ratio for new client financing to 100%, marking the first broker with public tightening measures amid surging interest in China’s stock market.】

item.title: 多米诺比萨企业因销售下滑加剧而下挫
item.description: 多米诺比萨企业有限公司（Domino's Pizza Enterprises Ltd.）大幅下挫，原因是这家亏损企业削减了股息，并称新财年的销售额下降得更快。【原文：Domino’s Pizza Enterprises Ltd. plummeted after the loss-making company slashed its dividend and said sales have fallen even faster in the new financial year.】

item.title: 收入不及预期，慧科股价创六个月最大跌幅
item.description: 澳大利亚航运软件公司 WiseTech Global Ltd 全年营收不及分析师预期，股价创六个月来最大跌幅。【原文：WiseTech Global Ltd shares dropped the most in six months after the Australian shipping software company’s full-year revenue missed analysts’ expectations.】

item.title: SpaceX 星际飞船在关键测试中将卫星送入太空
item.description: 太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的 "星际飞船"（Starship）火箭首次向太空发射并部署了卫星，然后在返回地球的大部分旅程中幸存下来，在经历了一年的火热挫折之后，实现了新的技术里程碑。【原文：SpaceX’s Starship rocket launched to space and deployed satellites for the first time before surviving most of its journey to Earth, achieving new technological milestones after a year of fiery setbacks.】

item.title: 特朗普加强对美联储理事库克的威胁，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普加倍努力推翻美联储理事职务后，市场对央行独立性和通胀风险的担忧加剧，黄金在周二上涨后持稳。【原文：Gold was steady after rising Tuesday on concerns over central bank independence and inflation risks after President Donald Trump doubled down on his efforts to oust a Federal Reserve governor.】

item.title: 伊朗将在核谈判结束后与欧洲 "保持联系
item.description: 伊朗与英国、法国和德国的代表将 "在未来几天内保持接触"，此前有关德黑兰核计划的会谈于周二结束，但未取得突破性进展。【原文：Iran and representatives of the UK, France and Germany will “maintain contacts in coming days” after talks on Tehran’s nuclear program concluded Tuesday without a breakthrough.】

item.title: SD Guthrie 计划在马来西亚数据中心枢纽建设工业园区
item.description: SD Guthrie Bhd.是世界上种植面积最大的油棕榈树种植公司，该公司正在马来西亚南部柔佛州开发一个绿色能源工业园区，以利用数据中心的蓬勃发展。【原文：SD Guthrie Bhd., the world’s biggest oil palm planter by acreage, is positioning itself to tap into the data-center boom as it looks to develop a green-energy powered industrial park in Malaysia’s southern state of Johor.】

item.title: 幻想体育博彩在印度非法平台上蓬勃发展
item.description: 印度已成为增长最快的体育博彩市场之一，幻想游戏平台从板球驱动的利基市场发展成为数字经济的基石。【原文：India has become one of the fastest-growing sports betting markets, with fantasy gaming platforms evolving from a cricket-driven niche into a cornerstone of the digital economy.】

item.title: 中国人工智能芯片领军企业康柏康因 DeepSeek 盈利创历史新高
item.description: 汇川技术公司（Cambricon Technologies Corp. ）上半年的利润创下历史新高，反映了中国政府在《深度学习》（DeepSeek）之后的人工智能热潮中鼓励使用本土技术后对中国芯片的需求浪潮。【原文：Cambricon Technologies Corp. swung to a record profit in the first half, reflecting a wave of demand for Chinese chips after Beijing encouraged the use of homegrown technology in a post-DeepSeek AI boom.】

item.title: 微软在办公室内抗议后重申以色列调查承诺
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp.微软公司总裁布拉德-史密斯（Brad Smith）重申了早些时候做出的承诺，即对有关以色列利用微软技术选择轰炸目标的报道进行调查，但他对占领其办公室、要求微软断绝与以色列关系的抗议者的行为表示谴责。【原文：Microsoft Corp. President Brad Smith reiterated an earlier pledge to investigate reports that Israel used its technology to select bombing targets, but he decried the actions of protesters who occupied his office demanding that the company sever ties with the country.】

item.title: 太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）的星际飞船在关键测试中发射升空，但却遭遇火灾挫折
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司周二晚间发射了其大型星际飞船火箭，进行了第 10 次重大试飞。【原文：Elon Musk’s SpaceX launched its massive Starship rocket on its 10th major test flight on Tuesday evening, a mission that comes with high stakes after a series of explosive setbacks this year.】
